description.text:
-The pixie reads from the book - 
$(b;spring)Squids$() can normally be found in groups under the water. Their ink is used for....Oh! Squid tentacles are also delicious when cooked!
 I'll $(b;spring)pet$() you $(b;autumn)mince$()!

You are covered ink! 
-The little pixie points and laughs- 
Let's dig in!
